alert.note: Alert for Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 4:58AM PST until January 06 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 9 inches expected. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County County for elevations greater than 2,500 feet including portions of Interstate 5. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Plan on slippery and snow covered road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will be around 2,500 feet Saturday morning, lowering to 2,000 feet Saturday night. Heaviest snowfall expected Saturday afternoon, with lingering snow showers into the evening and overnight hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for California can be obtained by calling 800-427-7623 (ROAD) or visit quickmap.dot.ca.gov for the latest road conditions before traveling.

area.areaDesc: Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
